Regarding the suggestion to make the various SM outfits have an effect, if I remember correctly someone already did this for SlaveMaker 3.5\Images\Appearances\Human\Female 8. It's in the avatar.xml file. Below is a copy of what's there, which I think I modified a bit from stock, but it should be pretty similar.

0 7 1 1 1 1 1 0 14 3 1 3 3 2 5 2
There might be more in here than just the clothing modifiers, I didn't write the whole thing. Hope this helps those interested though.
